Date: Month of testing session in MMM-YYYY format.

Integer: Indicates the order in which participants made groups of judgments. A block consists of 16 individual trials -- 2 sides (Left or Right) x 2 PatternTypes (Radial or Laminar) x 4 Coherence (Coh) levels
Integer: Index within a block indicating trial order.
Character/String: {Radial, Laminar}
Real: Proportion of dots on left side moving coherently.
Real: Proportion of dots on right side moving coherently.
Character: Which display, left or right (L or R) did participant chose as the changing side?
Real: Reaction time in seconds from start of trial to choice.
Integer: Did participant choose side with non-zero coherence?
Real: Proportion of dots moving coherently in the non-zero display on the left.
Real: Proportion of dots moving coherently in the non-zero display on the right.
Integer: Order of presentation for the speed conditions. A run consists of 5 blocks of 16 trials.
Integer: Speed of dot motion in degrees of visual angle per second.
Character: Self-reported gender M or F.
Character: Self-reported NIH Race category.
Character: Self-reported NIH Race category.
Character: Primary spoken language.
Character: Testing setting.
Character: State in which testing was conducted.
Character: Order in which speed conditions were run.
"Real: Age in years at date of test."
